Very comfy

It fit fine in the chest but the dress just did not do anything for me.  Appreciate that it has pockets but have to return it to find something I look better in.  I am 5'7" 145lbs, a 38C and ordered a M.  Hope this helps you.

Love the purple on white color, fits as expected, quality is good. Material is a medium weight. The waists sits a little higher than I would like but otherwise fits nicely. Doesn’t wrinkle. I wash on delicate cold and then hang to air dry. Doesn’t need ironing. Good value.

Looks great. Exactly as described. A little thin but it’ll be great for the beach. It has pockets! They aren’t deep but they can phone an iPhone, keys and lipstick in one pocket. Just like I imagined it would be!!
This was cute for my 16 yr old. She liked it. It's flattering for her body type (tiny). It's modest.

It's soft, beautiful, and you can wear it with high heels or with flip flops. The only thing I need to fix is the 2 front things that allow the bra to show. They need to be a little closer to each other to hide the bra.
Very pretty dress, material is soft and its not too short.
I love this dress! It is so pretty on and is so comfortable!

评论概述: Unfortunately it wasn't what i was hoping for.
评论详情: I first ordered this dress in the medium, since thats the size i normally wear. I could barely get it on, and there was a huge white faded spot on the front of the dress. It was way too small, so I returned it and eventually ordered the next size up. The Large just arrived today, and i was super excited to try it on. This time the top was too big, the shoulders wanted to slid off, and the neckline was severely droopy. And again there was a faded white patch on the front of the dress, tho not as much as the first time. So i will be returning it again, and not buying another. The colors were great, as was the style and texture, I just wish the fit would work for me. My sister also bought this same dress before i did, and had a major drooping problem with the neck. She kept hers a week, and washed it, bit it didn't improve.
This is a great comfortable dress. You can dress it up or dress it down. It is airy and has a slight flow. The color was perfect.
I purchased this dress for my daughter for her birthday and she loved it!! She wears it often and she pink flowered print is so pretty and well made!!
wore it to a babyshower. it was flowy and very well done. material was soft and no wrinkles

I bought this for my niece to wear for her confirmation in the Catholic Church.  It was the perfect dress for the occasion.  It is very difficult to find appropriate clothing for young girls these days so this was a happy find.  Fit, quality and color were ver good as well.  Very affordable.

I love this dress! Thicker material than I thought it would be, really flattering, beautiful color and perfect length. Recommend for anyone trying to minimize stomach appearance as well. I’m 5’3 and about 160lbs and purchased a large and it fits perfectly.
This dress is so cute! Perfect teacher dress, IT HAS POCKETS! Looks cute and feels comfy!

When I first opened my package I was a little hesitant due to it feeling very thin but it was not see through at all and it’s very comfortable! I wear a 40DDD and I got an XL. It fits great and has some extra wiggle room! The pockets are also a nice plus.
This dress is so cute and has pockets! The fabric quality is decent, soft and buttery. The length is great since I’m tall it’s hard to find dresses! But I’d be confident wearing this out and about.

Super cute style and fun pattern. Immediately loved this dress and am going to look into getting more colors. Bought for the May heat in  Texas and I think it’ll be perfect. The only thing I don’t love is that the pattern stretches out a bit across my chest. Got an XL. 5’4” 247lbs

Great summer purchase! I bought a size small and I am 5'1, 110lbs. The straps are a little loose, but I normally wear a XS. The dress was super light, flattering, and easy to pack and wash!! Great purchase.

Love the fabric, love the comfort, love the color, love the style! SOOO cute!
